name: R5-MarketingStatus-R4-MarketingStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MarketingStatus into FHIR R4

element.display: The marketing status describes the date when a medicinal product is actually put on the market or the date as of which it is no longer available

target.display: The marketing status describes the date when a medicinal product is actually put on the market or the date as of which it is no longer available
target.comment: R5 `MarketingStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MarketingStatus`

element.display: The country in which the marketing authorization has been granted shall be specified It should be specified using the ISO 3166 ‑ 1 alpha-2 code elements

target.display: The country in which the marketing authorisation has been granted shall be specified It should be specified using the ISO 3166 ‑ 1 alpha-2 code elements
target.comment: R5 `MarketingStatus.country` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `MarketingStatus.country` - country made the element mandatory; country increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1

element.display: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorization Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain

target.display: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
target.comment: R5 `MarketingStatus.dateRange` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `MarketingStatus.dateRange` - dateRange made the element mandatory; dateRange increased the minimum cardinality from 0 to 1
R5 `MarketingStatus.extension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MarketingStatus.extension`
R5 `MarketingStatus.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MarketingStatus.id`

element.display: Where a Medicines Regulatory Agency has granted a marketing authorization for which specific provisions within a jurisdiction apply, the jurisdiction can be specified using an appropriate controlled terminology The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified

target.display: Where a Medicines Regulatory Agency has granted a marketing authorisation for which specific provisions within a jurisdiction apply, the jurisdiction can be specified using an appropriate controlled terminology The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
target.comment: R5 `MarketingStatus.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MarketingStatus.jurisdiction`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `MarketingStatus.modifierExtension` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MarketingStatus.modifierExtension`

element.display: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorization Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain

target.display: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
target.comment: R5 `MarketingStatus.restoreDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MarketingStatus.restoreDate`

element.display: This attribute provides information on the status of the marketing of the medicinal product See ISO/TS 20443 for more information and examples

target.display: This attribute provides information on the status of the marketing of the medicinal product See ISO/TS 20443 for more information and examples
target.comment: R5 `MarketingStatus.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MarketingStatus.status`
